title: The most successful teams in quiz competition
summary: This chart compares the relative success of each Team in the quiz competition based on the Number of mistakes they made .
Team Fearless only had 1 mistakes , while Cats , DIY ABC and Smart_Kids made between 3 and 6 .
Team Lovely made the most mistakes , with 9 mistakes - an extra 50 % compared to the next worst Team .
gold: This chart shows the number of mistakes made by 6 teams in a quiz . The most successful team is Fearless with just a single mistake , followed by Cats with 3 , DIY with 4 , ABC with 5 , Smart Kids with 6 , and finally Lovely with 9 .
